description: I always try to be as professional as possible and pick the candidates right for the job. Being cute and willing to please me is a great bonus but qualification comes first. I don’t want to lose my job because of my naughty hobby. This was the first time I went against my principles. This boy wanted to be a programmer but had very little experience and his knowledge of English was terrible. I refused to give him the job but he insisted so much! He wasn’t going to give up on his dream. Normally, I would just tell him to leave. Unfortunately, I didn’t have much sex recently. The boy was so cute. I knew he would be fun so I gave him the job he desired. And I expected a lot in return from our wannabe programmer. This wasn’t going to be a short interview at all.
title: Dirty Scout 142
